alert.note: Alert for Camas Prairie; Owyhee Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 08 at 5:10AM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TUESDAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Wind gusts as high as 55 mph and whiteout conditions. * WHERE...Camas Prairie and Owyhee Mountains zones. * WHEN...From 11 AM Tuesday to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snowfall with very cold temperatures will likely continue through the weekend with another significant snowfall possible Saturday.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
